thread.title: Watch: Enormous, Terrifying Rogue Wave Hits California Beach, Hospitalizing 8 People While Sweeping Away Cars
thread.title_full: Watch: Enormous, Terrifying Rogue Wave Hits California Beach, Hospitalizing 8 People While Sweeping Away Cars

author: Jenna Sundel
title: Watch: Enormous, Terrifying Rogue Wave Hits California Beach, Hospitalizing 8 People While Sweeping Away Cars
text: [Watch: Enormous, Terrifying Rogue Wave Hits California Beach, Hospitalizing 8 People While Sweeping Away Cars](/news/rogue-wave-hits-california-beach-hospitalizing-8-people-while-sweeping-away-cars?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=trending_story) Watch: Enormous, Terrifying Rogue Wave Hits California Beach, Hospitalizing 8 People While Sweeping Away Cars None of the injuries were life-threatening, according to the Ventura County Fire Department [Jenna Sundel](/author/jenna-sundel) Eight people were hospitalized after a huge rogue wave slammed into a crowd in Southern [California](https://themessenger.com/search?s=California) on Thursday amid a high surf advisory. The Ventura County Fire Department (VCFD) shared [video](https://twitter.com/VCFD_PIO/status/1740541508707906012) of the surge, which swept cars away and flooded the roadway as people ran for safety as fast as they could. None of the injuries were life-threatening, Ventura County Fire Capt. Brian McGrath told the [Ventura County Star](https://www.vcstar.com/story/news/2023/12/28/high-surf-in-ventura-leads-to-rescue-of-8/72050745007/). The most serious injury was reportedly a broken ankle, according to [KCLU](https://www.kclu.org/2023-12-28/rogue-wave-injures-eight-damages-some-homes-in-ventura). VCFD heavy equipment crews are working to clear the debris from San Pedro Street, [Public Information Officer](https://twitter.com/VCFD_PIO/status/1740526817184989551) Andy VanSciver said on X. The wave occurred during the high surf advisory at high tide. The high surf warning is in effect until 10 p.m. on Saturday. [AI Can Now Predict Extreme Rogue Waves](/tech/ai-rogue-wave-ocean?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Cruise Ship on North Sea Loses Navigation and Power After a Rogue Wave Hits, Shatters Windows](/news/norwegian-cruise-ship-loses-navigation-storm-smashed-windows-north-sea?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [CNN Reporter Sees Her Own Car Broken Into While Covering California Auto Theft Wave](/news/cnn-reporter-sees-her-own-car-broken-into-while-covering-california-auto-theft-wave?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Newlywed Drowns While Snorkeling in Hawaii — Then Thieves Steal Belongings, Car From Beach](/news/newlywed-drowns-while-snorkeling-in-hawaii-then-thieves-steal-belongings-car-from-beach?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [It’s Not Yet Summer in Brazil, but a Dangerous Heat Wave Is Sweeping the Country](/news/its-not-yet-summer-in-brazil-but-a-dangerous-heat-wave-is-sweeping-the-country?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [City Bus Smashes Into California Restaurant in Terrifying Accident, Injuring at Least 14](/news/bus-slams-into-california-restaurant-injuring-at-least-14?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Ventura Police](https://twitter.com/Ventura_PD/status/1740467188803551696) announced that beaches in the area will be closed until further notice. Locals are being asked to avoid the area, "as it can be quite dangerous," according to the VCFD. The wave also caused damage to a beachfront motel and homes near the shoreline.
